com.facebook.buck.parser

Class PythonDslProjectBuildFileParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.PythonDslProjectBuildFileParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileParser<BuildFileManifest>, ProjectBuildFileParser, AutoCloseable

    public class PythonDslProjectBuildFileParser
extends Object
implements ProjectBuildFileParser
    Delegates to buck.py for parsing of buck build files. Constructed on demand for the parsing phase and must be closed afterward to free up resources.

    • Constructor Summary

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()

      • initIfNeeded

        public void initIfNeeded()
                  throws IOException
        Initialization on demand moves around the performance impact of creating the Python interpreter to when parsing actually begins. This makes it easier to attribute this time to the actual parse phase.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • globResultsMatchCurrentState

        public boolean globResultsMatchCurrentState(Path buildFile,
                                            com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<GlobSpecWithResult> existingGlobsWithResults)
        Description copied from interface: ProjectBuildFileParser
        Checks if existing GlobSpecs with results are the same as current state in the file system.
        Specified by:
        globResultsMatchCurrentState in interface ProjectBuildFileParser
        Parameters:
        buildFile - the buildFile location to be used by the Globber.
        existingGlobsWithResults - the existing (deserialized) GlobSpecWithResult to check the file system state against.
        Returns:
        true if glob expansion produces results matching previously recorded ones, false otherwise.
